alert.note: Alert for East Laramie County; Laramie Valley (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 01 at 1:28AM MST until December 05 at 2:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH LATE MONDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...Laramie Valley and East Laramie County. * WHEN...5 AM MST Saturday until 5 AM MST Tuesday. Wind gusts may frequently exceed 50 MPH through much of this period. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight or high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
